intro: Phyllanthus dusenii, commonly known as the Dusen's spurge, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Euphorbiaceae family, which includes many species with milky sap. The plant typically grows as a shrub, featuring small, simple leaves and yellowish flowers arranged in clusters. Its fruit is a capsule that splits open to release tiny seeds. Phyllanthus dusenii is often found in disturbed soils and can thrive in dry, sunny environments.
